title: Brooklyn Beckham's ex Hana Cross has new boyfriend, Nasser Alfallah
text:
She was recently pictured smooching a mystery man in Malibu following her high-profile split from her ex-boyfriend Brooklyn Beckham.

And Hana Cross' new love interest has been revealed as Nasser Alfallah, 19, who is a Loyola Marymount University student in Los Angeles and is originally from Kuwait.

On Tuesday, Hana, 22, was seen packing on the PDA with Nasser as they loitered around in a car park outside trendy eatery Nobu with a group of their pals.

Revealed: Hana Cross' new love interest has been revealed as Nasser Alfallah, 19, who is a Loyola Marymount University student in Los Angeles and is originally from Kuwait

Nasser, whose older sister is Mick Jagger's ex Noor Alfallah, gripped her close, as she flaunted her svelte frame in baggy black sweatpants and a matching beanie hat.

Noor, 25, made the headlines when she dated the Rolling Stones star, 76, in 2017 and has since insisted 'age didn't matter' when she dated the rocker - despite their 52-year age difference.

Earlier this year it was reported by the Aspen Times that Nasser was arrested for trespassing in a hotel room during a night out with his friends.

According to a police report, a security guard accidentally let Nasser into the wrong room, and he and a friend jumped up and down on beds where two women were sleeping.

Loved-up? On Tuesday, Hana, 22, was seen packing on the PDA with Nasser as they loitered around in a car park outside trendy eatery Nobu with a group of their pals

Across town Brooklyn was partying with stunning Canadian actress Natalie Ganzhorn, 21, at a plush Beverly Hills party over the weekend.

Photos of Brooklyn, 20, emerged on Tuesday showing the aspiring photographer leaving a mansion party with a gorgeous blonde, who has been identified as rising star Natalie.

The son of Victoria and David looked close with Natalie, who boasts over 40k followers on Instagram and a string of acting roles.

This timing of Brooklyn's outing with Natalie crosses over with reports that he is dating brunette actress Phoebe Torrance, 25, who previously worked as his mum Victoria's lookalike.

Hana dated Brooklyn, 20, for nine months but became known for having several high-profile arguments in public, before splitting.

Last month they risked an awkward run-in when they both showed up at the same exclusive event in London.

Moving on: Hana and Brooklyn were together for nine months (pictured in February)

Brooklyn was seen making his way into the LOVE & YouTube Fashion Week party, held at The Standard, within minutes of Hana's arrival.

Their night out at the same soirée came amid reports that Brooklyn kissed another of his exes, Lexy Panterra, while partying in the English capital.

It was also recently reported that Hana was left in tears by ex Brooklyn, after the pair faced an awkward run-in at the Agent Provocateur AW19 campaign launch party.

Rising star: Across town Brooklyn was partying with stunning Canadian actress Natalie Ganzhorn, 21, at a plush Beverly Hills party over the weekend

Influencer: The son of Victoria and David looked close with Natalie, who boasts over 40k followers on Instagram and a string of acting roles

A source told The Sun that she was consoled by her friends following the tense encounter, and was later seen leaving the party five minutes after Brooklyn.

The source said: 'They were chatting together and it was very tense. By the end of it I could hear Brooklyn say, '"it is what it is".

'He walked off and she went back to her friends looking dejected, but she held it together while her pals comforted her.'
description: Hana Cross' new love interest has been revealed as Nasser Alfallah, 19, who is a Loyola Marymount University student in Los Angeles and is originally from Kuwait.
